name: com.unity.cinemachine
description:
Smart camera tools for passionate creators. 

--- ATTENTION ---
Upgrading a project from Cinemachine 2.x to Cinemachine 3.x is not automatic and not trivial.
Don't do it unless you're willing to put in the required effort.

> For more details, refer to the upgrade guide:
https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.cinemachine@3.1/manual/CinemachineUpgradeFrom2.html
--------------------

samples.description: Sample scenes illustrating various ways to use Cinemachine
